data_sources.description: Training dataset containing datetime, count, and various features.
Testing dataset containing datetime and features but no count.
Sample submission file structure to guide output format.

data_variables.name: train
data_variables.description: DataFrame containing training data including datetime and feature variables.

data_variables.name: test
data_variables.description: DataFrame containing testing data including datetime and feature variables.

data_variables.name: X_train
data_variables.description: Features extracted from the train DataFrame for model training.

data_variables.name: X_test
data_variables.description: Features extracted from the test DataFrame for making predictions.

data_variables.name: Y_train
data_variables.description: Target variable (count) extracted from the train DataFrame.

data_variables.name: predictions
data_variables.description: Predicted counts for the test dataset generated by the model.

data_variables.name: submission
data_variables.description: DataFrame for final submission containing the prediction counts.

data_flow.creation: Extracted from train DataFrame containing feature names.
Extracted from test DataFrame containing feature names.
Extracted from train DataFrame for the label.
Generated by model predictions using X_test.
Starts as a sample submission DataFrame, updated with predictions.
